toc.envision_location: Class Libraries\WEL\WEL Interface Content\WEL Common Concepts

paragraph.paragraph:
When you inherit
/libraries/wel/reference/support/wel_application_chart.html WEL_APPLICATION , you will need to implement the deferred feature main_window as a once function. This will be the main window of your application, and can be any descendent of WEL_COMPOSITE_WINDOW.
paragraph.note:
Note. See
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/step2/index.html step2 in the
/libraries/wel/samples/tutorial/index.html tutorial for a simple demonstration of how to do this.
